      • MinimumEntropyScoringFunction

        public MinimumEntropyScoringFunction(AlignedSequences row,
                             AlignedSequences col)
        Standard constructor from superclass ScoreMatrix. Each AlignedSequences instance is transformed into a double character array, ex: 
         {@link AlignedSequences} ACGTTCG , ACGTCCG
 transformed in: [A,A],[C,C],[G,G],[T,T],[T,C],[C,C],[G,G]
        Parameters:
        row - first sequences
        col - second sequences
